articles.title: World Cocktail Day: 14 best classic summer cocktails - Recipes
articles.description: World Cocktail Day is celebrated on May 13 every year. This World Cocktail Day, celebrate your love for alcohol and all things healthy with these classic summer cocktails that will help you beat the heat and keep you calm as well.
articles.content: Combine 90 ml red wine, 5 ml brandy, 15 ml orange juice, 1/4 cup sparkling water, 10 ml simple syrup, a few slices of orange, and 2 tbsp of pomegranate seeds, and mix well. Enjoy.
